name: Dino World (FILVIN)
description:
Dino World is a game about a small green dinosaur who wants to run to the end! The game is inspired by several projects at once - the Touhou Project, the chrome dinosaur and flappy bird.
A distinctive feature of the game:
1. High complexity.
2. Very long.
3. Has an end.
4. Will improve.
5. Color pixel graphics.
